She opened the portal to Hyrule with a spell. "I wonder if Link will remember me?" She thinks to her self as she steps through. There was a blinding flash as she felt herself falling through open space. Suddenly she heard a loud Splash!

She was suddenly underwater! She tried to swim to the surface, but then she remembered she could levitate. She floated out of the water to the shore. The portal she opened had opened right above the Hyrule Lake.

"Stupid magic." She grumbled. But what she didn't know, was that the water of Lake Hyrule was enchanted, and had a certain effect on Twilight creatures. For one, she looked down and noticed she was back in her imp form. "Oh no!" She exclaimed. "Not again!"

She decided that she could fix it later. She went off to find Link. But, the water was having a second effect on her.

TL:DR
Midna's magic has limits now so she has to walk, she can be seen by normal people, and she goes to Links house a year and 8 months later Trust me You'll know where to start.


Little did Midna know, Zant had left a small present specifically to impede her and Link's progress during their quest the previous year. Granted he didn't realize it would only end up doing anything well over a year later. He also didn't realize he was pretty bad at curses, and that the original curse on Midna was mostly Ganon doing the work. This "Curse" of Zant's will end up bringing Midna joy, and some mild inconvenience...

"Great start to my little 'vacation' first I fall into Lake Hylia" She used some magic to dry off "And I'm stuck in this puny Imp body again." Midna said with a sigh

"I don't even have my curves anymore" She pouted. Oh, the irony

She surveyed her surroundings and spotted what she was looking for, a cave in the side of the cliff next to the edge of the lake. Lanayru spring, the light spirit which lives here once helped her... Or at least they tried to anyway. Either way, they had a nice little body of water inside of the cave that she could relax in, as long as no-body shows up.

She floated into the cave, and called out for the spirit inside. A large, ghostly, golden snake manifested within the chamber.

"Who seeketh my aid?" The spirit looked down and spotted Midna. "Oh, it's you again, I didn't get a chance to apologize last time you were here. So you know, sorry for failing miserably to keep Zant from hurting you and your friend... and almost getting you killed in the process. No hard feelings?"

"Lookee here 'Danger-Noodle', I accept you're apology but I need you're help again." She stammered "I'm stuck as an imp again, can you tell me why?"

"Looks like you went and got yourself cursed again... If I were to guess, Zant probably enchanted the water in some way to annoy you if he ended up losing the war. He probably did this to all the water in Hyrule just in case you ended up coming back, as a sort of, 'Last Laugh' as others would say. Fair warning though, It looks like he might have done more than just stick you in that body again. If I were you I would keep an eye out for any other changes. Also take this" The light spirit dropped a little ball of what looked like it was candy into Midna's hands. "This will keep you from being injured by the sun light. Zelda had one made for you on the off chance that you managed to find your way back to Hyrule. Just eat it and you can stand outside in the sun."

"So like, what? Do I have some sort of limited pool of magic now that I'm currently burning off by levitating here?" In response to this, her body immediately fell to the ground. "Wow, okay... I was just joking but he actually did that." She slowly stood up, not used to having to walk in this form.

"Well now, be on you're way, I have other, light spirit businesses to attend to." Lanayru said

"Wait, can you just do me one last favor before I let you off the hook forever" She leaned in towards the light spirit "Can you tell me where Link is?"

"Huh, Ordon said something about seeing him the other day, so I recommend you check out his house, AKA the place where he lives and spends most of his time. Him and Zelda didn't really hit it off."

"Okay, Jeez, I'll go check his house, no need to be rude." She popped the small candy into her mouth "hmm, tastes like honey."

She stepped out of the cave and into the warm sunlight. "I'm glad that I can actually deal with the light now."

So Midna Sets off on her relatively short Journey to find Link again and follow up on her promise.

After walking for what seems like days Midna finally made it to Ordon. She couldn't quite find Link, along with the fact that everyone could see her (Having quickly learned this after someone stared at her for a solid minute.) so she had to be pretty stealthy to avoid any strange looks. "Link's House" this is the place, she climbed the ladder to Link's house and tried the door, it was unlocked and she snuck right in.

Midna decided the best way to meet up with Link again, was to lie down on his bed... She looked around the entire house and couldn't find one

"Does he seriously not have a bed? She opened Link's closet to find a small mat rolled up in the corner "Bingo, he does actually sleep" She closed the closet door "Guess I'll save that for later then."

Midna darted into the shadows as she heard footsteps on Link's porch.

TEMPORARY POV SHIFT



Link was finally able to come home after a long day of ranch work, ever since Zant and Ganon's plans to try to take over Hyrule failed, his life had seemingly returned to normal. He had re-sealed the master sword and kept a shard from the mirror of Twilight as a reminder of what he had experienced. "Have a nice night Link, I'll see you tomorrow morning at the ranch. I promise I won't accidentally let out any more goats... Heh!" Fado, Link's long time "friend" retorted. "Just take it easy kid, you worked hard today."

Link waved him goodbye and entered his home removing his cap and placing it on the table. he walked over to his fireplace and started piling up kindling when he heard one of his floor boards in the neighboring room creak. He let out a warning that if someone wanted to steal from him, they would have to deal with him. He started walking toward the doorway to the next room when he was caught off guard by an old friend fulfilling their promise.

"That is definitely, not the best way to greet an old friend" Midna walked out of the side room with her arms folded across her chest. Her mouth forming a wide smile, snaggletooth proudly on display, and her helmet with all it's markings, covered in light from the window.

AND NOW WE GO BACK TO MIDNA CAM


Here's What you Came For


Link was adorned in his old hero's clothing, save for the cap which set down. His jaw had dropped having not expected to ever see her again... but at the same time, why was she an imp again, so he asked the touchy question.

"I'm glad you asked Link! Zant in his overwhelming annoyance left me a little present in the water supply, I came back to Hyrule and fell into Lake Hylia shortly before I reverted back to this body." She motioned towards her body, "as you can plainly see, I look exactly like I did almost 2 years ago."

"So, 'Hero' I made a promise and I intend to follow through on it. Get comfortable big boy, we have some 'catching up' to do.

Midna sat down as Link explained the events after the war in great detail, all the while Midna listened to every word he said. "Well that sounds much more interesting than what I was up to, I just had to calm down the citizens of a small kingdom before re-taking the throne.

"So let's get to the real reason why I'm here, during our travels I found myself a little... well, attracted to you." She looked at Link with Lustful eyes, not knowing the changes her body was about to undergo. "Take off you're clothes, Link, I want you right here, right No-" She could see her view of Link moving downward and felt herself being pulled forward.and got slightly confused. Link started to sweat profusely.

"Midna... you may want to look down." Link stuttered out
Yes I just made Link talk, Deal with it
as he pointed toward her chest.

Her chest which was once flat as a board was now sporting some small, yet still noticeable breasts, but that still didn't explain why her view was so elevated. She reached down to touch the seat but was instead met with flesh.

"Is that my... Butt?" She touched it again and felt her fingers squish into it. She looked down to see her ass covering most of the chair "Yep, That's my butt, today is officially one of the most awkward days of my life."

She lifted her head to face Link. "Well then Hero" She looked to Link greedily.

Do You Want to Show Me Your Master Sword?

So Midna enter through the portal, but something went wrong as she step through the portal, as her body start it to deconstruct her body to quickly move to her desire realm, But instead of appearing in Hyrule as she wanted to happen she is teleported in our reality, as her body start it to reconstruct back to her form she was.

She sees that she is back at her Imp form self and also that the portal teleported on another realm, As Midna comes out at the end of the other side of the portal, she sees where the lands to be a huge plain field is all cover of concrete and tall structure that can block your view and buildings that are bigger than a inn or a farm, but how will she get so big?

-----------------------------

choices: I feel like a De ja vu happening, umm next?
155332.content: How about if Midna gets transported to the universe of Legend of Zelda Hyrule Warriors, where a war its about to happen, not to mention that theres another Midna in this reality in which she is also in her imp form, and both happen to meet one another by accident and both of them are now affected by something that it could eaither be beneficial for both of them or will end up becoming a huge problem for the rest of their allies and firends.
155332.title: in the time of the Hyrule Warriors

1553322.content: What if the mirror of Twilight in Breath of The Wild wasn't just a nod to Twilight princess, and she gets to meet the new and improved Link?
1553322.title: Next

info.brief_description: Midna  returns to Hyrule for a vacacation till sonething growing happens to her
info.description:
Its been 8 months since Hyrule was Save after the events of twilight ,thanks to Link and Zelda that gave the final blow to destroy Ganondorf ,With the Help of the Twilight Princess ,Hyrule has return once more into a Peacefull place ,Till one day Princess Midna from all the sudden starts growing Bigger....

RULES
1) in the story Your Main Character is Midna you can write in first person or third person

2) when Midna Returns to Hyrule she returns in her imp form by a mysterious force (People's say that she looks cute when she was in that form anyway :P )

3)plz clothes doen't grow with her....sort of :P...although her imp form has no clothes with her other than her helmet, soo the helmet doesn't grow with her ^^;(yeah i know ....it doesn't makes sense)

4)your Allow to add Vore, extreme sex, foot crush butt crush ,belly crush also she can have play toys,food toys or sex toys (your choice)

5)Midna can have other ways to grow,Belly grow breast growth Butt Growth

6)you can make Midna Grow Extremely Hungry and/or Extremely Horny

7)Midna and Link Can't Die In other words if Midna out grows the planet she doesn't die out of breath,...after all she can make a spell to breath out in space

8)please make no misspell words to often for people to understand the story, i don't want them have a hard time trying to figure it out what you spell,is ok if you miss spell some...

9)Midna can outgrow the planet and more

10) Midna can Visit the Links Universe of other games of Legend of Zelda in case you want something new for example

11) in the story when Midna gets Big for whatever type of big you wish to add if it is Growth types like muscle growth , belly growth, butt growth breast growth or body growth
